pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Spatial Autoregressive Model // A Hierarchical Spatial Autoregressive Model (HSAR), based on a Bayesian Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) algorithm ( Dong and Harris (2014) doi:10.1111/gean.12049 ). The creation of this package was supported by the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC) through the Applied Quantitative Methods Network: Phase II, grant number ES/K006460/1.
